description:
JB calls me up, "Dude I'm outta work, do you have anything I can do?"

Brent had admitted that he had let a guy suck his dick once, and that he would be ok with a guy sucking his dick as long as he didn't have to do anything back. Once again, having the glory hole was allowing me to get these dudes in the door with out putting too much pressure on them.
JB didn't even flinch when he saw that big dick of Brent's sliding through the hole, and quickly had his dick out, though he was told not to take it for fear it might send Brent flying. Thankfully Brent didn't seem to mind, and I am pretty sure JB got off on servicing him.
He's not a squirter, but he kind of busted in JB's mouth (there's cum on lips at the end that I didn't see while filming..HOT!)
Anyway, I am still working on perfecting this series. I could have shot it in High Def, but the bathroom is so small, that the wide angle lense shows too much. I do want to get better lights and play with the cumshot angles. So stay tuned for more as I experiment with the theme.
title: Brent & JB - G:hOle Oral
